name: Flappy Bird 3D (doodleyubin)
description:
It's simply Flappy Bird in 3D... but with some changes. First off all, you shouldn't touch the pipes or the enemies. If you see a red looking bird you should shoot it. On the bottom-left corner off the screen you can see your ammo. There's also cheese spawning around which you can collect. It will give you +1 ammo. You can also use your special power when you have 5 ammo. Hm, I wonder what happens if you get a score of 100 points...

Here are the controlls:

  • Space - Jump
  • Mouse - Look Around
  • Left Mouse Button - Shoot
  • Right Mouse Button - Special Power
  • Escape - Pause
